about_the_game:
Plan, calculate, invest and manage. That and many other tasks are on your to-do list, dear future industry giant! But how do you become really successful quickly, effectively and without detours? The Official Guide to Industry Giant 4.0 provides you with additional information on your way to becoming a true industry mogul. Tips & tricks, a complete overview of all topics, production, industries and possibilities and some deeper insights than usual ensure a very special economic simulation game experience.

Contents of the official guide
  • The first steps
  • Production and supply chain management
  • Infrastructure and logistics
  • Market economy and trade
  • Technology and research
  • Zones and urban development
  • Tips, tricks, FAQs

How to access the Official Guide
All digital goodies can be found in the game's install directory within the folder ‘’Official Guide‘’ (Steam\SteamApps\common\Industry Giant 4.0) after the ‘Official Guide’ DLC has finished downloading.
